languages.text: {n}На лице офицера появляется ошарашенное выражение.{/n} "При всем моем уважении, Ваша Светлость..." {n}Офицер обрывает сам себя и отрывисто кланяется.{/n} "Будет исполнено".

traits.locale_text: {n}На лице офицера появляется ошарашенное выражение.{/n} "При всем моем уважении, Ваше Благородие..." {n}Офицер обрывает сам себя и отрывисто кланяется.{/n} "Будет исполнено".

languages.text: {n}A dumbfounded expression appears on the officer's face.{/n} "With the deepest respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}The officer thinks better of his next words and abruptly bows.{/n} "It will be done."
languages.original_text: {n}На лице офицера появляется ошарашенное выражение.{/n} "При всем моем уважении, Ваша Светлость..." {n}Офицер обрывает сам себя и отрывисто кланяется.{/n} "Будет исполнено".

traits.locale_text: {n}A dumbfounded expression appears on the officer's face.{/n} "With the deepest respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}The officer thinks better of his next words and abruptly bows.{/n} "It will be done."

{n}A dumbfounded expression appears on the officer's face.{/n} "With the deepest respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}The officer thinks better of his next words and abruptly bows.{/n} "It will be done."

{n}A dumbfounded expression appears on the officer's face.{/n} "With the deepest respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}The officer thinks better of his next words and abruptly bows.{/n} "It will be done."

{n}A dumbfounded expression appears on the officer's face.{/n} "With the deepest respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}The officer thinks better of his next words and abruptly bows.{/n} "It will be done."

languages.text: {n}将校の顔が驚愕の表情になる。{/n}「畏れながら、陛下…」{n}将校は次の言葉をよく考え、急に頭を下げる。{/n}「仰せのままに」
languages.original_text: {n}A dumbfounded expression appears on the officer's face.{/n} "With the deepest respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}The officer thinks better of his next words and abruptly bows.{/n} "It will be done."

traits.locale_text: {n}将校の顔が驚愕の表情になる。{/n}「畏れながら、陛下…」{n}将校は次の言葉をよく考え、急に頭を下げる。{/n}「仰せのままに」

languages.text: {n}军官露出了目瞪口呆的表情。{/n}“请允许我向您致意最崇高的敬意，大人，可……”{n}他意识到接下来的话还是不说为妙，于是猛地鞠了一躬。{/n}“遵命。”
languages.original_text: {n}A dumbfounded expression appears on the officer's face.{/n} "With the deepest respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}The officer thinks better of his next words and abruptly bows.{/n} "It will be done."

traits.locale_text: {n}军官露出了目瞪口呆的表情。{/n}“请允许我向您致意最崇高的敬意，大人，可……”{n}他意识到接下来的话还是不说为妙，于是猛地鞠了一躬。{/n}“遵命。”

languages.text: {n}En la cara del oficial aparece una expresión de estupefacción.{/n} «Con el debido respeto, {mf|milord|milady}...». {n}El oficial medita sus próximas palabras y se inclina bruscamente.{/n} «Delo por hecho».
languages.original_text: {n}A dumbfounded expression appears on the officer's face.{/n} "With the deepest respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}The officer thinks better of his next words and abruptly bows.{/n} "It will be done."

traits.locale_text: {n}En la cara del oficial aparece una expresión de estupefacción.{/n} «Con el debido respeto, {mf|milord|milady}...». {n}El oficial medita sus próximas palabras y se inclina bruscamente.{/n} «Delo por hecho».

languages.text: {n}Der Gesichtsausdruck des Offiziers verrät komplette Entgeisterung.{/n} "Bei allem Respekt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ..." {n}Der Offizier äußert seine nächsten Worte lieber nicht und verbeugt sich abrupt.{/n} "Wird erledigt."
languages.original_text: {n}A dumbfounded expression appears on the officer's face.{/n} "With the deepest respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}The officer thinks better of his next words and abruptly bows.{/n} "It will be done."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Gesichtsausdruck des Offiziers verrät komplette Entgeisterung.{/n} "Bei allem Respekt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ..." {n}Der Offizier äußert seine nächsten Worte lieber nicht und verbeugt sich abrupt.{/n} "Wird erledigt."

languages.text: {n}Le visage de l'officier affiche un air stupéfait.{/n} « Avec tout le respect que je vous dois, Votre Seigneurie... » {n}commence-t-il, puis il se reprend et s'incline brusquement.{/n} « Il en sera fait selon votre volonté. »
languages.original_text: {n}A dumbfounded expression appears on the officer's face.{/n} "With the deepest respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}The officer thinks better of his next words and abruptly bows.{/n} "It will be done."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage de l'officier affiche un air stupéfait.{/n} « Avec tout le respect que je vous dois, Votre Seigneurie... » {n}commence-t-il, puis il se reprend et s'incline brusquement.{/n} « Il en sera fait selon votre volonté. »

languages.text: {n}Subayın yüzünde hayretini gösteren bir ifade beliriyor.{/n} "Saygıda kusur etmek istemem {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri..." {n}Subay, söyleyeceği sözleri dikkatle tartıp ardından aniden önünde eğiliyor.{/n} "Emriniz başım üstüne."
languages.original_text: {n}A dumbfounded expression appears on the officer's face.{/n} "With the deepest respect, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}The officer thinks better of his next words and abruptly bows.{/n} "It will be done."

traits.locale_text: {n}Subayın yüzünde hayretini gösteren bir ifade beliriyor.{/n} "Saygıda kusur etmek istemem {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri..." {n}Subay, söyleyeceği sözleri dikkatle tartıp ardından aniden önünde eğiliyor.{/n} "Emriniz başım üstüne."
